subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tigers pitcher Al Alburquerque kissed the baseball before throwing to first in a crucial playoff situation, a move that evoked memories of Mark Fidrych’s antics in the 1970s.
snippet: Tigers pitcher Al Alburquerque kissed the baseball before throwing to first in a crucial playoff situation, a move that evoked memories of Mark Fidrych’s antics in the 1970s.
